OrgName: Identity Theft Guard Solutions, Inc. dba ID Experts
activities:
Information received will be records pertaining to our clients' data breach affected individuals.  This data is used to assemble communications to the affected population of a breach incident.

Personal information received is generally limited to name, address, city, state, postal code, email address and phone number.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: We collect client and member data which includes name, address, city, postal code, email and phone numbers.  Information is transmitted electronically.
